ground_truth: Malbin hurries up to meet him. Handing Malbin the gun, Tuvia runs off to investigate. He whips back a curtain across the door of a cabin. Lilka, Bella, and Riva are with Tamara and her baby. He strides away. Tuvia gazes at Lilka and his face softens. She plants a kiss on his lips. He looks at her in mute surprise. She stands in front of him unflinching. Slowly he moves his mouth towards hers, lightly brushing her lips. They kiss more fully. He smiles and their lips meet again. Beyond some trees, a German truck full of soldiers drives across a metal bridge followed by a car. Aron, hiding behind a tree, watches faithfully. At the camp, Shimon and Malbin are hunched over their chess set. A message bag, a German courier. People crowd round the blond head German. Tuvia checks Aron's cheek, then sits down at the table and opens the courier's leather case. He hands a document to Shimon. Malbin watches anxiously as people's anger turns to violence. Tuvia has his back turned as a bearded Jew spits on a man, and Shelman, the man who brought him, kicks him in the back. Tuvia and Shimon hurry over. Tuvia remains at a distance watching the mob take over. The German is felled. Aaron, his cheek swollen, turns away. Bella viciously slams the man with her rifle butt. Tuvia glances at Asael and walks off. Shimon and Malbin wincing, watch the mob savagely beat the man to death, with eyes dulled and a numbed expression. Tuvia comes across Aron sitting hunched on a mossy bank, his rifle on his lap, a hand to his mouth. Tuvia leans against a tree and watches his young brother's distress. Asael observes from a distance. At night, a guard patrols the camp. In his cabin, bathed in golden lamplight, Tuvia is sitting up in bed bare-chested with Lilka lying against him, covered by a blanket. He pulls her close to him and they settle down to sleep. Early one morning, at the army camp, Zus strides into Viktor's tent. Viktor turns to Zus. Zus turns to leave the commander's hut. Zus strides past Lova, glancing at a German plane crossing the sky. At the camp Tuvia and Malbin see it too. People pack up their belongings, guns and grenades loaded into baskets and bags. Tuvia peers up to the sky at a plane changing direction. He dives towards Aron as the bomber passes overhead. People run in all directions as bombs explode around them. Many are hit. Tuvia and Lilka herd women and children through the smoke and flame towards the largest bunker. A woman is hit. More and more people are bundled into the shelter.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution

The man is viciously slammed with a rifle butt by Bella. Asael is glanced at by Tuvia before he walks off. The mob savagely beats the man to death, observed by Shimon and Malbin, wincing, with eyes dulled and a numbed expression. From a distance, Asael observes. At night, the camp is patrolled by a guard. In his cabin, Tuvia sits up in bed, bare-chested with Lilka against him, covered by a blanket and bathed in golden lamplight. He pulls her close and settling down to sleep is done by them. Early one morning, at the army camp, into Viktor's tent strides Zus. Zus is turned to by Viktor. Zus strides past Lova, glancing at a German plane crossing the sky, as he turns to leave the commander's hut. At the camp, it is seen by Tuvia and Malbin too. Belongings are packed up by people, and guns and grenades are loaded into baskets and bags. Up to the sky peers Tuvia at a plane changing direction. Aron is dived towards by him as the bomber passes overhead. As bombs explode around them, people run in all directions. Many are hit. Women and children are herded by Tuvia and Lilka through the smoke and flame towards the largest bunker. A woman is hit. More and more people are bundled into the shelter.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: Malbin rushes to meet Tuvia, who hands him a gun and runs to investigate. In a cabin, he finds Lilka, Bella, Riva, Tamara, and her baby, then leaves. Tuvia gazes at Lilka, who kisses him, surprising him. They kiss again, exchanging smiles. Meanwhile, a German truck full of soldiers crosses a bridge. Aron watches from hiding. At camp, Shimon and Malbin play chess. A German courier arrives, and Tuvia examines his documents, handing one to Shimon. Tuvia watches as anger turns to violence; the German courier is beaten to death. Tuvia finds Aron distressed and sits with him. Asael watches from afar. At night, Tuvia and Lilka share a moment in their cabin. Early next morning, Zus enters Viktor's tent and leaves the commander's hut. He notices a German plane and so do Tuvia and Malbin. The camp packs up urgently. A plane changes course, dropping bombs. Tuvia shields Aron as chaos ensues. Tuvia and Lilka guide women and children to a bunker amid explosions. A woman is hit, and more people are hurried into the shelter.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: Malbin rushes to meet Tuvia, who gives him a gun and runs to investigate a cabin. Inside, Lilka, Bella, Riva, Tamara, and her baby are gathered. Tuvia's face softens as Lilka kisses him. They kiss again as a German truck with soldiers crosses a bridge. Aron watches from behind a tree. At camp, Shimon and Malbin play chess. People crowd around a German courier. Tuvia checks Aron's cheek, sits, and opens the courier's case, handing a document to Shimon as anger turns violent. Tuvia observes as the German is attacked. Bella hits the man with her rifle, and the mob kills him. Tuvia sees Aron distressed, rifle in lap, and watches, with Asael observing from afar. At night, in golden light, Tuvia in bed with Lilka, pulls her close as they sleep. Early morning, Zus enters Viktor's tent, then leaves, glancing at a German plane. Back at camp, Tuvia and Malbin see it too. People pack belongings, loading guns and grenades. A plane changes direction, and as bombs fall, Tuvia and Lilka lead women and children to a bunker amid chaos.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: Malbin quickly hurries up to meet him with urgency in his stride. Handing the gun over to Malbin, Tuvia immediately runs off with determination to investigate the situation further. Swiftly, he whips back the curtain that hangs across the doorway of a humble cabin. Inside, Lilka, Bella, and Riva are gathered together with Tamara, who is cradling her baby. With purpose, he strides away from the scene. As Tuvia pauses to gaze at Lilka, his stern expression softens noticeably. She then plants a gentle kiss on his lips, catching him off guard. He looks at her, filled with mute surprise. Unflinching, she stands resolutely in front of him. He slowly moves his mouth towards hers once again, lightly brushing her lips in a tender gesture. This time, they kiss more fully, sharing a deep connection. He smiles warmly, and their lips meet yet again. Beyond the cover of some trees, a German truck loaded with soldiers drives across a sturdy metal bridge, followed closely by a car. Hidden behind a tree, Aron watches faithfully and intently. Back at the camp, Shimon and Malbin are hunched over their chess set, deep in concentration. A message bag, belonging to a German courier, captures their attention. Crowds of people gather around the blond-headed German. Observing everything, Tuvia checks Aron's cheek thoughtfully, then sits down at the table and carefully opens the courier's leather case. He hands an important document over to Shimon. With Malbin watching anxiously, the atmosphere among the people shifts from anger to violence. Tuvia, with his back turned, remains unaware as a bearded Jew spits on a man, and Shelman, the man who has brought the German, delivers a harsh kick to his back. Tuvia and Shimon hurry over to the scene unfolding. Tuvia, however, remains at a distance, watching with caution as the mob begins to take over. The German, their target, is felled. Aaron, sporting a swollen cheek, turns away from the sight. Bella, with a fierce resolve, viciously slams the man with her rifle butt. Tuvia glances at Asael, then walks off purposefully. Shimon and Malbin, wincing at the brutality, watch as the enraged mob savagely beats the man to death, their expressions dulled and numb from the violent scene. Soon after, Tuvia comes across Aron, who is sitting hunched on a mossy bank, his rifle resting on his lap, a hand pressed to his mouth. Tuvia leans against a nearby tree, quietly observing his young brother's distress. From a distance, Asael observes the scene with concern. As night falls, a guard dutifully patrols the camp. Inside his cabin, bathed in warm golden lamplight, Tuvia sits up in bed, bare-chested with Lilka lying peacefully against him, both of them covered by a comforting blanket. He pulls her close, and together they settle down contentedly to sleep. Early one morning, at the army camp, Zus strides confidently into Viktor's tent. Viktor turns to face Zus, acknowledging his presence. Zus then turns to leave the commander's hut, his demeanor resolute. As Zus strides past Lova, he takes a moment to glance at a German plane as it crosses the sky above. Back at the camp, Tuvia and Malbin notice the plane as well. People start to hurriedly pack up their belongings, with guns and grenades being loaded into baskets and bags. Tuvia peers up into the sky, noticing a plane changing its direction. As the bomber flies overhead, he dives protectively towards Aron. People rush in all directions as bombs explode violently around them. Many are caught in the devastation. Tuvia and Lilka urgently herd the women and children through the chaos of smoke and flame towards the safety of the largest bunker. A woman is tragically hit amidst the turmoil. More and more people are quickly bundled into the shelter, seeking refuge from the onslaught.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: Malbin, with an air of urgency in each step, quickly hurries forward to meet him, urgency marked by every stride he takes. Tuvia hands over the gun to Malbin, and without wasting a moment, he immediately dashes off with determination, driven to further investigate the unfolding situation. Swiftness defines his movements as he whips back the curtain that hangs across the entryway of a humble cabin. Inside the modest dwelling, Lilka, Bella, and Riva are gathered together along with Tamara, who is tenderly cradling her baby in her arms. With a sense of purpose, Tuvia strides away from this scene, leaving behind the small group. As he pauses to gaze at Lilka, his previously stern expression visibly softens into something more gentle. She then leans forward and plants a gentle, unexpected kiss on his lips, catching him off guard. Filled with mute surprise, he looks at her. She stands resolutely in front of him, unwavering in her stance. Slowly, he moves his mouth towards hers once again, lightly brushing her lips with a tender gesture. This time, they share a fuller kiss, establishing a deep connection between them. He smiles warmly, and once more, their lips meet again in an affectionate embrace. Beyond the cover of some dense trees, a German truck heavily loaded with soldiers drives steadily across a sturdy metal bridge, followed closely by an accompanying car. Hidden behind a nearby tree, Aron watches faithfully and intently, ensuring he misses nothing. Back at the camp, Shimon and Malbin are deeply absorbed in their game, hunched over their chess set with intense concentration. A message bag, belonging to a German courier, captures their discerning attention. Crowds of people gather around the blond-headed German, stirring in anticipation. Observing everything, Tuvia carefully checks Aron's cheek thoughtfully, then proceeds to sit down at the table, where he meticulously opens the courier's prized leather case. He hands an important document over to Shimon. With Malbin watching anxiously, the atmosphere among the gathered people shifts ominously from anger to impending violence. Tuvia, his back turned to the commotion, remains unaware as a bearded Jew spits on a man, and Shelman, the man responsible for bringing the German, delivers a harsh kick to the man’s back. Tuvia and Shimon hurry over to the scene that is unfolding with urgency. Tuvia, however, maintains a cautious distance, watching as the mob begins to take over, the German their single-minded target. He is felled by the crowd, and Aron, sporting a cheek now swollen, turns away from the unsettling sight. Bella, with fierce resolve written on her face, viciously slams the man with the butt of her rifle. Tuvia glances at Asael, then walks off with determined purpose. Shimon and Malbin, their expressions wincing at the ongoing brutality, watch as the enraged mob savagely beats the man to death, their faces dulled and numb from the violent scene before them. Soon after, Tuvia stumbles upon Aron, who sits hunched on a mossy bank, his rifle resting across his lap and a hand pressed thoughtfully to his mouth. Tuvia leans against a nearby tree, observing his young brother's visible distress with a quiet presence. From a distance, Asael watches the scene unfold, his expression marked with concern. As night falls, a solitary guard dutifully patrols the camp with vigilance. Inside his cabin, bathed in warm, golden lamplight, Tuvia sits up in bed, bare-chested, with Lilka lying peacefully against him, both of them covered by the comforting embrace of a blanket. He gently pulls her close, and together they settle down contentedly, preparing to drift into the restful embrace of sleep. Early one morning, at the nearby army camp, Zus strides with confidence into Viktor's tent. Viktor, acknowledging his presence, turns to face Zus. Having made his presence known, Zus turns and leaves the commander's hut, his demeanor resolute and unwavering. As he strides past Lova, he takes a brief moment to glance up at a German plane as it crosses the expansive sky above. Back at the camp, both Tuvia and Malbin notice the plane as well. People around them start to hurriedly pack up their belongings, with guns and grenades swiftly being loaded into baskets and bags. Tuvia peers up into the sky, noticing the plane changing its direction. As the bomber flies directly overhead, he instinctively dives protectively toward Aron. Chaos erupts as people rush in every direction, with bombs exploding violently around them. Many find themselves caught in the devastation. Tuvia and Lilka urgently herd the women and children through the chaos of smoke and flame towards the safety of the largest, sturdiest bunker. Amidst the turmoil, a woman is tragically hit. More and more people are quickly bundled into the shelter, desperately seeking refuge from the relentless onslaught.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: Malbin rushes forward with urgency to meet him, closing the distance between them with brisk strides. As soon as Malbin reaches him, Tuvia swiftly hands over the gun, placing it firmly in Malbin’s grasp before turning away without hesitation. With a sense of purpose, Tuvia takes off, running with determination to investigate, his feet moving swiftly beneath him. Upon reaching the cabin, he expertly whips back the curtain that hangs across the doorway, revealing the interior where Lilka, Bella, and Riva are gathered together with Tamara and her baby. He then strides away, carrying with him the urgency of his earlier actions. Tuvia's gaze lingers on Lilka, and as he looks at her, the tension in his face softens, melting into a more tender expression. In response to his softened demeanor, Lilka leans in and plants a firm kiss on his lips, her boldness catching him off guard. Stunned by her initiative, he looks at her with muted surprise, taking in her unflinching stance before him. Slowly, Tuvia inclines his head and gently moves his mouth towards hers once more, lightly brushing her lips, initiating a more intimate connection. As they engage in a fuller kiss, his lips curve into a smile, and they meet again in a moment of shared affection. Meanwhile, beyond some trees in the distance, a German truck filled with soldiers rumbles across a metal bridge, closely followed by a car. Hidden behind a tree, Aron remains vigilant, watching the vehicles pass with unwavering attention. Back at the camp, Shimon and Malbin are bent over their chess set, focused on their game as a message bag arrives, carried by a German courier. A crowd gathers around the blond-headed German, curiosity piqued by his presence. Tuvia checks Aron's cheek, ensuring his well-being, before sitting down at the table and opening the courier's leather case methodically. He extracts a document from the case and hands it to Shimon, who receives it with intent observation, while Malbin watches the proceedings with anxious anticipation. As the atmosphere around them grows tense, the crowd's anger begins to escalate into violence. With Tuvia’s back turned, a bearded Jew confronts a man, spitting on him in contempt, while Shelman, the man who brought him, delivers a kick to his back. Tuvia and Shimon quickly move towards the commotion, but Tuvia remains at a distance, observing as the mob takes control. The German figure is ultimately felled, succumbing to the crowd's wrath. Aron, his cheek visibly swollen, turns away from the scene. Bella, driven by anger, forcefully slams the man with the butt of her rifle, unleashing her fury. Tuvia casts a glance at Asael, their eyes meeting briefly, before he walks off, distancing himself from the unfolding chaos. Shimon and Malbin, with expressions of discomfort and disbelief, witness the mob brutally beating the man to death, their eyes dulled by the savagery they observe. Tuvia later encounters Aron sitting hunched on a moss-covered bank, his rifle resting on his lap and a hand pressed against his mouth, clearly distressed. Tuvia leans silently against a nearby tree, watching his younger brother's turmoil with a heavy heart. Asael watches the scene from afar, perceiving the gravity of the moment. As night falls, a guard patrols the camp, maintaining vigilance. Inside his cabin, enveloped in the warm glow of golden lamplight, Tuvia is seated upright in bed, bare-chested, with Lilka nestled against him, both covered by a blanket. He pulls her closer, wrapping an arm around her as they settle down to sleep, seeking comfort in each other's presence. As dawn breaks one morning, at the army camp, Zus strides purposefully into Viktor’s tent, his gaze meeting Viktor’s as he turns to acknowledge Zus's entrance. After a brief exchange, Zus turns to leave the commander's hut, maintaining his decisive pace. He strides past Lova, casting a glance skyward at a German plane slicing through the sky. At their camp, Tuvia and Malbin also catch sight of the plane, their focus drawn upwards. People begin to hurriedly pack their belongings, hastily loading guns and grenades into baskets and bags, preparing for what lies ahead. Tuvia continues to peer upward, his eyes following the plane as it changes direction ominously. With a surge of urgency, he dives towards Aron as the bomber roars overhead, a prelude to imminent danger. Panic erupts, and people scatter in all directions as bombs rain down, exploding with destructive force around them. Amidst the chaos, many are struck, and cries of pain fill the air. Tuvia and Lilka assume leadership, guiding women and children through a haze of smoke and flames towards the relative safety of the largest bunker. A woman is struck, her fall a stark reminder of the peril they face. Despite the danger, more and more people are hurriedly bundled into the shelter, seeking refuge from the onslaught.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: Malbin hurries to meet Tuvia, who hands him the gun before running off to investigate. Tuvia quickly checks a cabin where he finds Lilka, Bella, Riva, Tamara, and her baby, then leaves. As he gazes at Lilka, his expression softens, and they share a kiss that deepens into a smile and another kiss. Meanwhile, a German truck and car cross a bridge, observed by Aron hiding behind a tree. At the camp, Shimon and Malbin play chess as Tuvia checks on Aron and opens a German courier's leather case, handing a document to Shimon. Tensions rise, leading to violence against a German, as Tuvia watches from a distance. After witnessing the mob's brutality, Tuvia walks off, noticing Aron's distress from afar, and comforts him. Asael observes the scene. At night, Tuvia and Lilka lie together, settling down to sleep in the lamplight. Early the next morning at an army camp, Zus visits Viktor's tent and leaves, glancing at a German plane overhead. Tuvia, Malbin, and others at their camp notice the plane as well. As people hurriedly pack belongings, guns, and grenades, Tuvia sees the plane change direction and rushes to protect Aron. Chaos ensues as bombs fall, with Tuvia and Lilka guiding women and children through smoke and flames to the largest bunker, while people scramble to safety amid explosions.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description:
Malbin hurries up to meet him, knowing the urgency of their situation in these dangerous times. Handing Malbin the gun, a reliable Soviet-issue Tokarev TT-33, Tuvia runs off to investigate. He whips back a curtain across the door of a rudimentary wooden cabin, typical of the makeshift camps where they hide from German patrols. Lilka, Bella, and Riva are with Tamara and her baby, offering comfort amidst uncertainty. He strides away, resolute. Tuvia gazes at Lilka and his face softens, as they share a moment of tenderness amidst the constant threat of war. She plants a kiss on his lips, a daring gesture given their perilous environment. He looks at her in mute surprise, captured by the intensity of the moment. She stands in front of him unflinching, her resolve unshaken. Slowly he moves his mouth towards hers, lightly brushing her lips, their connection offering a brief escape. They kiss more fully, a silent promise in a time of chaos. He smiles and their lips meet again, their shared warmth a temporary relief.

Beyond some trees, a German truck full of soldiers from the notorious Waffen-SS division drives across a metal bridge followed by a staff car. Aron, hiding behind a tree, watches faithfully, his loyalty to the group's survival unwavering. At the camp, Shimon and Malbin are hunched over their chess set, the game a rare moment of distraction. A message bag, carried by a captured German courier, becomes the center of attention. People crowd around the blond-headed German, seeing him as the enemy. Tuvia checks Aron's cheek, then sits down at the table and opens the courier's leather case, hoping for useful intelligence. He hands a document to Shimon, an experienced strategist. Malbin watches anxiously as people's anger turns to violence, a constant risk in their volatile camp. Tuvia has his back turned as a bearded Jew spits on the man, venting years of oppression, and Shelman, the man who brought him, kicks him in the back, a grim reminder of their desperation. Tuvia and Shimon hurry over, attempting to regain control. Tuvia remains at a distance watching the mob take over, his expression a mix of regret and understanding. The German is felled as the group vents their collective rage. Aaron, his cheek swollen from an earlier skirmish, turns away, disheartened by the unfolding brutality. Bella viciously slams the man with her rifle butt, anger fueled by loss and grief. Tuvia glances at Asael and walks off, thinking of the consequences. Shimon and Malbin, wincing, watch the mob savagely beat the man to death, with eyes dulled and a numbed expression, the violence a grim necessity in their fight for survival.

Tuvia comes across Aron sitting hunched on a mossy bank, the dampness a minor discomfort compared to his inner turmoil, his rifle on his lap, a hand to his mouth to stifle any sounds. Tuvia leans against a tree, an ancient birch that has witnessed many forest secrets, and watches his young brother's distress, feeling his helplessness. Asael observes from a distance, understanding the weight on his brother's shoulders. At night, a guard patrols the camp, ensuring the group's safety under the cover of darkness.

In his cabin, bathed in golden lamplight that flickers soothingly, Tuvia is sitting up in bed bare-chested with Lilka lying against him, covered by a blanket that barely wards off the night’s chill. He pulls her close to him, cherishing the fleeting moment of peace, and they settle down to sleep, hopeful for a safer dawn.

Early one morning, at the army camp, Zus strides into Viktor's tent, bringing vital news from the resistance network. Viktor turns to Zus, understanding the significance of his presence. Zus turns to leave the commander's hut, knowing his mission is far from over. Zus strides past Lova, glancing at a German plane crossing the sky, a chilling reminder of the ever-present threat. At the camp, Tuvia and Malbin see it too, their alertness heightened by the encroaching danger. People pack up their belongings, precious supplies of guns and grenades loaded into baskets and bags, ready to move at a moment's notice. Tuvia peers up to the sky at a plane changing direction, signaling imminent attack. He dives towards Aron as the bomber passes overhead, his instincts sharp from countless encounters. People run in all directions as bombs explode around them, a scramble for survival. Many are hit, casualties of the relentless assault. Tuvia and Lilka herd women and children through the smoke and flame towards the largest bunker, the fortified shelter offering their best chance. A woman is hit, her cries lost in the chaos. More and more people are bundled into the shelter, a desperate bid for safety in the face of destruction.

test_cases.name: Addition (~50%)
test_cases.description: Malbin hurries up to meet him. Handing Malbin the gun Tuvia runs off to investigate. He whips back a curtain across the door of a cabin. Lilka Bella and Riva are with Tamara and her baby. He strides away. Tuvia gazes at Lilka and his face softens. She plants a kiss on his lips. He looks at her in mute surprise. She stands in front of him unflinching. Slowly he moves his mouth towards hers lightly brushing her lips. They kiss more fully. He smiles and their lips meet again. Beyond some trees a German truck full of soldiers drives across a metal bridge followed by a car. Aron hiding behind a tree watches faithfully. At the camp Shimon and Malbin are hunched over their chess set. A message bag. a German courier. People crowd round the blond head. German. Tuvia checks Aron's cheek then sits down at the table and opens the courier's leather case. He hands a document to Shimon. Malbin watches anxiously as people's anger turns to violence. Tuvia has his back turned as a bearded Jew spits on a man and Shelman the man who brought him kicks him in the back. Tuvia and Shimon hurry over. Tuvia remains at a distance watching the mob take over. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. The German is felled. Aaron his cheek swollen turns away. Bella viciously slams the man with her rifle butt. Tuvia glances at Asael and walks off. Shimon and Malbin wincing watch the mob savagely beat the man to death with eyes dulled and a numbed expression. Tuvia comes across Aron sitting hunched on a mossy bank his rifle on his lap a hand to his mouth. Tuvia leans against a tree and watches his young brother's distress. Asael observes from a distance. At night a guard patrols the camp. In his cabin bathed in golden lamplight. Tuvia is sitting up in bed barechested with Lilka lying against him covered by a blanket. He pulls her close to him and they settle down to sleep. Early one morning at the army camp. Zus strides into Viktor's tent. Viktor turns to Zus. Zus turns to leave the commander's hut. Zus strides past Lova glancing at a German plane crossing the sky. At the camp Tuvia and Malbin see it too. People pack up their belongings guns and grenades loaded into baskets and bags. Tuvia peers up to the sky at a plane changing direction. He dives towards Aron as the bomber passes overhead. People run in all directions as bombs explode around them. Many are hit. Tuvia and Lilka herd women and children through the smoke and flame towards the largest bunker. A woman is hit. More and more people are bundled into the shelter.

test_cases.name: Addition (~80%)
test_cases.description: Malbin hurries up to meet him. Handing Malbin the gun Tuvia runs off to investigate. He whips back a curtain across the door of a cabin. Lilka Bella and Riva are with Tamara and her baby. He strides away. Tuvia gazes at Lilka and his face softens. She plants a kiss on his lips. He looks at her in mute surprise. She stands in front of him unflinching. Slowly he moves his mouth towards hers lightly brushing her lips. They kiss more fully. He smiles and their lips meet again. Beyond some trees a German truck full of soldiers drives across a metal bridge followed by a car. Aron hiding behind a tree watches faithfully. At the camp Shimon and Malbin are hunched over their chess set. A message bag. a German courier. People crowd round the blond head. German. Tuvia checks Aron's cheek then sits down at the table and opens the courier's leather case. He hands a document to Shimon. Malbin watches anxiously as people's anger turns to violence. Tuvia has his back turned as a bearded Jew spits on a man and Shelman the man who brought him kicks him in the back. Tuvia and Shimon hurry over. Tuvia remains at a distance watching the mob take over. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Cleo paddles down to greet her. Tossing Cleo the umbrella, Nico skips off to contemplate. She flutters open a window beside the attic of a cottage. Mila, Ava, and Nora are with Clara and her kitten. She twirls away. Nico peers at Mila and his frown vanishes. She sprays a wink on his cheek. He stares at her in quiet puzzlement. She lounges beside him unfazed. Slowly he tilts his ear towards hers, barely grazing her cheek. They hug more heartily. He chuckles and their foreheads touch again. Beyond some hills, a French boat full of carpenters paddles under a stone arch followed by a bicycle. Zane, hiding under a bush, listens cautiously. At the greenhouse, Evan and Cleo are crouched over their checkerboard. A letter box, a French messenger. Creatures gather around the brunette Frenchman. Nico pats Zane’s ear, then crouches by the stove and unseals the messenger's linen pouch. He flips a scroll to Evan. Cleo listens nervously as creatures' excitement shifts to laughter. Nico has his face forward as a masked owl barks at a lady, and Omar, the lady who found him, nudges her in the shin. Nico and Evan scurry over. Nico stays at an intersection observing the group take over. The Frenchman is tripped. Zane, his ear reddened, glances down. Ava harshly taps the lady with her brush tip. Nico glances at Jules and jogs away. Evan and Cleo flinching, observe the crowd wildly brush the lady to silence, with eyes glazed and a passive demeanor. Nico stumbles upon Zane leaning slouched on a snowy mound, his brush on his knee, a glove to his chin. Nico leans beside a statue and observes his young sister's turmoil. Jules notices from afar. At dusk, a cat ambles the site. In her attic, bathed in silver moonlight, Nico is standing by a shelf bare-footed with Mila curled beside him, wrapped by a shawl. He pulls her toward him and they drift off to nap. At dawn, near the navy site, Lars stomps into Hunter's yurt. Hunter turns to Lars. Lars spins to enter the leader's tent. Lars marches past Juno, peeking at a French balloon floating the horizon. By the greenhouse Nico and Cleo spot it as well. Creatures gather up their gadgets, chairs and pans packed into carts and sacks. Nico gazes down to the ground at a balloon shifting path. He leaps towards Zane as the basket floats beneath. Creatures scatter in all paths as firecrackers burst near them. Many are tapped. Nico and Mila steer men and wildlife through the fog and water toward the smallest cave. A man is tapped. More and more creatures are pushed into the alcove.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Tuvia hands Malbin a gun and checks on Lilka, sharing a tender kiss. Meanwhile, a German truck with soldiers passes by, and Aron observes from hiding. At camp, Tuvia opens a German courier's case, sparking violence among the crowd. Tuvia watches as the mob attacks a German man, while Aron turns away distressed. Later, Tuvia comforts his brother and spends the night with Lilka. Zus visits Viktor's tent at a nearby army camp. A German plane appears, prompting Tuvia, Malbin, and others to pack and prepare. As bombs fall, Tuvia and Lilka lead women and children to safety, though some are struck. The group seeks refuge in a large bunker amidst chaos.
